      • searchResiduoName

        public Residuos searchResiduoName(java.lang.String name)
        This method allows you to search a residue by its name
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the residue that you are going to search
        Returns:
        the method return null if there is no residue with this name, return the residue otherwise

        Returns:

        public void createBiodegradable(java.lang.String id,

                                java.lang.String origen,

                                int time,
                                boolean composting)
        Create a new residue type biodegradable and add it to the arraylist
        Parameters:
        id - Identification
        name - Name of the residue
        origen - Origin of the residue
        color - Color of the residue
        time - Time it takes to decompose
        composting - Boolean saying if its work to composting or not
